name: LG Ally
description:
3G Android™-Powered Smartphone, Downloadable Apps, Customizable Widgets
The Android™-Powered LG Ally™ gives you the ability to customize home screens, and switch from surfing the web and emailing to text messaging and updating your social status. Turn-by-turn directions from Google Maps™ and thousands of apps in Android Market™, you'll be ready for any adventure today - and a new one tomorrow.

connectivity.cell: 1.9 GHz CDMA PCS, 800 MHz CDMA, EVDO Rev. A, 1xRTT

additionalFeatures: Accessibility features: Tactile QWERTY keyboard, four-direction keypad, start and end call buttons, dedicated number keys, camera button, TalkBack screen reader
